actions.text: Reported by the Committee on Public Works + Transportation. H. Rept. 102-103.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 67.
Mr. Roe moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.
Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings with an amendment. With written report No. 102-144.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 217.

official_title: To authorize the Fort Smith Airport Commission to transfer to the city of Fort Smith, Arkansas, title to certain lands at the Fort Smith Municipal Airport for construction of a road.

summary.text: Authorizes the Fort Smith Airport Commission to transfer to the city of Fort Smith, Arkansas, title to certain lands at the Fort Smith Municipal Airport for construction of a road in exchange for the transfer from the city of the title to lands within the airport on which Airport Loop Road and other specified roads are situated and the closure of such roads to public use. Prohibits the Secretary of Transportation from consolidating flight service stations until the expiration of 12 months after the auxiliary flight service station plan required under the Department of Transportation and Related Agencies Appropriation Act, 1991 is submitted to the Congress.

titles.title: To authorize the Fort Smith Airport Commission to transfer to the city of Fort Smith, Arkansas, title to certain lands at the Fort Smith Municipal Airport for construction of a road.
